title: Rams family on sale
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723114544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rams_4225.png)

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografiaramis/rams/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723114544/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografiaramis/rams/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipografiaramis/rams/")

Available for 70% off its original price until May 8, 2013. I really like this font, it has a flair of Futura without copying it, closer to its 20s art deco influence than Gotham or Proxima Nova.
author: Core0
